Page.Name: MiniAdventureXP
Page.OnShow: Parent.Levels.LevelTrade.Visible=true Parent.Levels.LevelAscension.Visible=false Parent.MiniAscensionXP.Visible=false Parent.MiniTitheXp.Visible=false Parent.MiniGuildXp.Visible=false Parent.MiniAchievementXP.Visible=false Parent.MiniTradeskillXp.Visible=false hide_window MainHUD.StartButton

Button.Name: SwitchXP
Button.Tooltip: Showing Adventure XP Click here to show Achievement XP

Page.Name: MiniAchievementXP

Checkbox.Name: PCCButton
Checkbox.OnSet: show_window Custom.ProfitUI_ControlCenter Tooltip='Hide ProfitUI Control Center'
Checkbox.OnUnset: hide_window Custom.ProfitUI_ControlCenter Tooltip='Show ProfitUI Control Center'

Page.Name: AdventureXP
Page.OnShow: Parent.Levels.LevelTrade.Visible=true Parent.Levels.LevelAscension.Visible=false Parent.AscensionXP.Visible=false Parent.AchievementXP.Visible=false Parent.TradeskillXP.Visible=false Parent.GuildXP.Visible=false Parent.TitheXP.Visible=false

Button.Name: SwitchXP
Button.OnPress: Parent.Parent.AdventureXp.Visible=false Parent.Parent.GuildXp.Visible=false Parent.Parent.TradeskillXp.Visible=false Parent.Parent.AchievementXP.Visible=true Parent.Parent.AscensionXP.Visible=false Parent.Parent.TitheXP.Visible=false
Button.Tooltip: Showing Adventure XP Click here to show Achievement XP

Page.Name: AchievementXP
Page.OnShow: Parent.Levels.LevelTrade.Visible=true Parent.Levels.LevelAscension.Visible=false Parent.AscensionXP.Visible=false Parent.GuildXP.Visible=false Parent.TradeskillXP.Visible=false Parent.AdventureXP.Visible=false Parent.TitheXP.Visible=false

Button.Name: SwitchXP
Button.OnPress: Parent.Parent.AdventureXp.Visible=false Parent.Parent.GuildXp.Visible=false Parent.Parent.TradeskillXp.Visible=true Parent.Parent.AchievementXP.Visible=false Parent.Parent.AscensionXP.Visible=false Parent.Parent.TitheXP.Visible=false

Page.Name: TradeskillXP
Page.OnShow: Parent.Levels.LevelTrade.Visible=true Parent.Levels.LevelAscension.Visible=false Parent.AscensionXP.Visible=false Parent.AchievementXP.Visible=false Parent.GuildXP.Visible=false Parent.AdventureXP.Visible=false Parent.TitheXP.Visible=false

Button.Name: SwitchXP
Button.OnPress: Parent.Parent.AdventureXp.Visible=false Parent.Parent.GuildXp.Visible=true Parent.Parent.TradeskillXp.Visible=false Parent.Parent.AchievementXP.Visible=false Parent.Parent.AscensionXP.Visible=false Parent.Parent.TitheXP.Visible=false

Page.Name: GuildXP
Page.OnShow: Parent.Levels.LevelTrade.Visible=true Parent.Levels.LevelAscension.Visible=false Parent.AscensionXP.Visible=false Parent.AchievementXP.Visible=false Parent.TradeskillXP.Visible=false Parent.AdventureXP.Visible=false Parent.TitheXP.Visible=false

Button.OnPress: Parent.Parent.AdventureXp.Visible=false Parent.Parent.GuildXp.Visible=false Parent.Parent.TradeskillXp.Visible=false Parent.Parent.AchievementXP.Visible=false Parent.Parent.AscensionXP.Visible=true Parent.Parent.TitheXP.Visible=false

Button.OnPress: Parent.Parent.AdventureXp.Visible=false Parent.Parent.GuildXp.Visible=false Parent.Parent.TradeskillXp.Visible=false Parent.Parent.AchievementXP.Visible=false Parent.Parent.AscensionXP.Visible=false Parent.Parent.TitheXP.Visible=true

Page.Name: TitheXP
Page.OnShow: Parent.Levels.LevelTrade.Visible=true Parent.Levels.LevelAscension.Visible=false Parent.GuildXP.Visible=false Parent.AchievementXP.Visible=false Parent.TradeskillXP.Visible=false Parent.AdventureXP.Visible=false Parent.AscensionXP.Visible=false

Button.OnPress: Parent.Parent.AdventureXp.Visible=true Parent.Parent.GuildXp.Visible=false Parent.Parent.TradeskillXp.Visible=false Parent.Parent.AchievementXP.Visible=false Parent.Parent.AscensionXP.Visible=false Parent.Parent.TitheXP.Visible=false
Button.Tooltip: Showing Tithe XP Click here to show Adventure XP

Text.Name: XP
Text.OnTextChanged: COND1=(Text==Zero) COND2=(Text==Zero2) COND=(COND1 || COND2) Visible=COND ? false : true
